title: Lamb and barley soup
ingredients: ['For the soup', '1 tbsp extra virgin olive oil', '340 g (12 oz) lean boneless lamb, cut into 2 cm (¾ in) dice', '1 onion, chopped', '2 carrots, cut into 1 cm (½ in) dice', '250g (8½ oz) turnip or swede, cut into 1 cm (½ in) dice', '100 g (3½ oz) pearl barley', '1.2 litres (2 pints) lamb or chicken stock', '2 tsp chopped fresh rosemary', '1 tsp chopped fresh thyme', '100 g (3½ oz) frozen peas', 'salt and pepper', 'For the herb scones', '225 g (8 oz) plain flour', '1 tbsp baking powder', '55 g (2 oz) butter', '3 tbsp chopped parsley', '3 tbsp snipped fresh chives', '1 tbsp finely chopped fresh rosemary', '150 ml (5 fl oz) semi-skimmed milk']
